verses.verse: <WG2532> Brothers,<WG80> I<WG1473> <WG1410> couldn't<WG1410> speak<WG2980> to you<WG5213> as<WG5613> to spiritual,<WG4152> but<WG235> as<WG5613> to fleshly,<WG4559> as<WG5613> to babies<WG3516> in<WG1722> Christ.<WG5547>

I<WG1473> planted.<WG5452> Apollos<WG625> watered.<WG4222> But<WG235> God<WG2316> gave the increase.<WG837>
So then<WG5620> neither<WG3777> he<WG2076> who plants<WG5452> is anything,<WG5100> nor<WG3777> he who waters,<WG4222> but<WG235> God<WG2316> who gives the increase.<WG837>

For<WG1063> we are<WG2070> God<WG2316>'s fellow workers.<WG4904> You are<WG2075> God<WG2316>'s farming,<WG1091> God<WG2316>'s building.<WG3619>

According to<WG2596> the grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> which<WG3588> was given<WG1325> to me,<WG3427> as<WG5613> a wise<WG4680> master builder<WG753> I laid<WG5087> a foundation,<WG2310> and<WG1161> another<WG243> builds on it.<WG2026> But<WG1161> let<WG991> each man<WG1538> be careful<WG991> how<WG4459> he builds on it.<WG2026>
For<WG1063> no one<WG3762> can<WG1410> lay<WG5087> any other<WG243> foundation<WG2310> than<WG3844> that which has been laid,<WG2749> which<WG3739> is<WG2076> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

Don't<WG3756> you<WG1492> know that<WG3754> you<WG1492> are<WG2075> a temple<WG3485> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> that God<WG2316>'s Spirit<WG4151> lives in<WG1722> you?<WG5213>

Let<WG1818> no one<WG3367> deceive<WG1818> himself.<WG1438> If<WG1487> anyone<WG5100> thinks<WG1380> that he is<WG1511> wise<WG4680> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> world,<WG165> let him become<WG1096> a fool,<WG3474> that<WG2443> he may become<WG1096> wise.<WG4680>

For<WG1063> the wisdom<WG4678> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889> is<WG2076> foolishness<WG3472> with<WG3844> God.<WG2316> For<WG1063> it is written,<WG1125> "He has taken the wise<WG4680> in<WG1722> their craftiness.<WG3834>"

whether<WG1535> Paul,<WG3972> or<WG1535> Apollos,<WG625> or<WG1535> Cephas,<WG2786> or<WG1535> the world,<WG2889> or<WG1535> life,<WG2222> or<WG1535> death,<WG2288> or<WG1535> things present,<WG1764> or<WG1535> things to come.<WG3195> All<WG3956> are<WG2076> yours,<WG5216>
